thread.title: Giants' Prince Amukamara out 2-4 weeks with chest injury; cornerback hurt in win over 49ers
thread.title_full: Giants' Prince Amukamara out 2-4 weeks with chest injury; cornerback hurt in win over 49ers

title: Giants' Prince Amukamara out 2-4 weeks with chest injury; cornerback hurt in win over 49ers
text:
Giants' Prince Amukamara out 2-4 weeks with chest injury; cornerback hurt in win over 49ers THE ASSOCIATED PRESS   12:36 pmLast   12:36 pm   
People: 
New Jersey (545) 
EAST RUTHERFORD, New Jersey â€” New York Giants cornerback Prince Amukamara is going to miss two to four weeks because of a chest injury. 
Giants coach Tom Coughlin disclosed the pectoral injury before Thursday's practice for Monday night's game at Philadelphia. Amukamara was hurt in the victory over the San Francisco 49ers on Sunday night. 
Jayron Hosley is expected to replace Amukamara, who leads the team with seven passes defended. Hosley started against Washington when Dominique Rodgers-Cromartie was out with a concussion. 
The Giants also signed cornerback Brandon McGee and offensive lineman Xavier Proctor to their practice squad. To make room, the team terminated the contracts of offensive lineman Adam Gettis and tight end Dominique Jones.
